verses.name: Acts 7:7
verses.text: And the nation to whom they shall be in bondage will I judge, said God: and after that shall they come forth, and serve me in this place.

verses.name: Acts 7:8
verses.text: And he gave him the covenant of circumcision: and so Abraham begat Isaac, and circumcised him the eighth day; and Isaac begat Jacob; and Jacob begat the twelve patriarchs.

verses.name: Acts 7:9
verses.text: And the patriarchs, moved with envy, sold Joseph into Egypt: but God was with him,
